attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I and many other British people think we should have an Election now.   This Government is not keeping its promises, and is certainly incompetent.

Excuses, excuses is all we here.   You say it will not happen again but it does.   The PM is weak and we did not vote for him.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
